alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Lorain; Medina; Richland; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 12:49PM EDT until July 28 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Richland County in north central Ohio... Southwestern Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Ashland County in north central Ohio... Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Lorain County in north central Ohio... Northwestern Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 130 PM EDT. * At 1249 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Savannah to near Ashland to 7 miles west of Loudonville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Wooster, Ashland, Orrville, Lodi, Loudonville, New London, Creston, Shreve, West Salem, Chippewa Lake, Hayesville, Savannah, Holmesville, Polk, Sullivan, Seville, Smithville, Apple Creek, Westfield Center and Spencer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Holmes; Lorain; Medina; Richland; Wayne
